title: YouTube Video Analysis with Gemini AI
description: Analyze YouTube videos using Google's Gemini AI to extract comprehensive insights, key quotes, and structural analysis.

youtube_url.title: YouTube URL
youtube_url.description: The YouTube video URL to analyze (e.g., https://youtu.be/VIDEO_ID or https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VIDEO_ID)

use_default_key.title: Use Default Gemini API Key
use_default_key.description: Check this to use the built-in Gemini API key. If unchecked, you must provide your own API key below.

gemini_api_key.title: Your Gemini API Key (Optional)
gemini_api_key.description: Your Google Gemini API key. Only required if 'Use Default Gemini API Key' is unchecked. Get your API key from https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey
